import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' export default function LoanManeger() { const[loanName,setLoanName]=useState() const[loanPrice,setLoanPrice]=useState() const[loanDebt,setLoanDebt]=useState() const[loanInfo,setLoanInfo]=useState() const [loanData, setLoanData] = useState([]) console.log(loanData) const loanRequest=()=>{ const clone = [...loanData] clone.push( { loanName, loanPrice, loanDebt, loanInfo } ) setLoanData(clone) console.log(loanData) } return (
